image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from New Mexico; born in Ruidoso, Lincoln County, N. Mex., March 16, 1964; an enrolled member of the Cherokee Nation; graduated from Cloudcroft High School, Cloudcroft, N. Mex.; A.A., ITT Educational Services, Inc., Boise, ID; attended New Mexico State University, Las Cruces, N. Mex.; realtor; business owner; legislative analyst; member of the New Mexico state house of representatives, 2011-2019; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress in 2018; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021-January 3, 2023); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022.
